title: Tactical Knowledge and Behavioral Development Program for Athletes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of sports event operations and experience in team strategy development
context.additional_context: Practical training for in-service professionals in a BYOD environment, reflecting real-world scenarios

learning_goals: Learners improve tactical decision-making skills by over 80% through simulation activities resembling real-game environments.
Learners improve communication efficiency by 70% while executing tactical actions through collaboration with team members.
Learners are assessed on their ability to apply tactical knowledge by creating portfolios based on individual game analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
